tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am so happy that I could find such Great doctor in terms of experience and expertise in knee related ailments (especially for aged) and more than anything his patience in dealing with elderly is impeccable. 

His clinic is with adequate space and quite clean, and adequate number of friendly staff. To me It‚Äôs not a fancy 5 star rated ambience is important but certainly 5 stars rated treatment is, and I believe Dr Mani Venugopal is proving he and his team provides that very well to his patients. 

Thank you
I would like to give feedback about Practo being available 24/7. I fixed appointment at 5 am when my son came home with severe ankle pain after night shift. Thanks a lot.

I thank the Doctor for his yeoman service!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My uncle was suffering from knee pain and we were looking for doctor closeby. Within a few minutes on the road, a shop owner recommended this doctor. Excellent work. In fact, meeting a patient there who had also visited kept harping on about the best treatment they had received. My uncle, on the other hand, received the best care. üíØ I will recommend Dr. Venugopal to my family and friends.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very disappointed. The appointment was moved twice.. from 1 pm...to 4 pm... I got a practi notification twice confirming my appointment. I traveled the distance with my pain only to find out the doctor was absent! Some other doctor saw me after waiting for 30 min... plus I was charged 700 rs ? Why? You have failed to assign the Doctor that was promised? Why then charge the same amount? How are u compensating for my time and the inconvenience caused?Terrible!!!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Mani Venugopal combines experience and a willingness to listen and discuss. 
This is my second visit. 
The Doctor puts the patient at ease. 
I felt confident in my receiving medical care.After assessment of the patient,he clearly explains the issues and explains the treatment calmly and clearly. He is well supported by his dedicated staff and the radiography technician. My only suggestion is that the doctor need not go to the radiography room every time a shot is taken for viewing the X-ray results . Technology is now available to enable him view the results sitting in his room.

I went for a follow up checkup for my back and sciatic pain. Doctor spends time to understand the problem, prescribe exercises and medicines accordingly. I felt reassured after consulting him before a long trip.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
